desc: Honey Hive Hair Salons in Manly & Warriewood are colour experts in Sydneys Northern Beaches. Formerly called Colour Only Salons, our hairstylists offer hair colour services, cutting, styling & hair products. Transform yourself, feel beautiful & be pampered by our caring team! Blonde, balayage & root melt specialists!

layout.text:
Trust your blonde hair to us, we are
the leading blonde specialists on the Northern Beaches
